name: dont worry about it
description:
In memory of Daniel D. Johnston, Hi, How are You?

NAE and I, have been workin' on a game to help you get over your fears and it feels like a better time than ever to release it! 

In this 3D Arcadey Parkour Platformer I'll teach you how to get over love, drugs and nihilism by looking through your thoughts, teaching you how to kill them all then showing you how to run really fast! It's easy! :D

Album here: https://soundcloud.com/bubblynae/sets/dont-worry-about-it-official
